author: rwatler
msg: JS2-1005: ProfilerContext session serialization/server kill errors
- corrected serialization of ProfilerContext by making inner class static and using an explicit transient reference to
profiler and defining a default serial version id.
- prevent access to J2 configuration after server stopped/killed by ensuring guest principal name is accessed when any
- access to PAM stopPortletApplication() in JetspeedContainerServlet and unit tests protected by check to ensure PAM
